Today's session started with a surprise goblin ambush on the road to the city of Oakhaven. Our heroes, Arion the Bard and Evelyn the Paladin, were caught off guard but fought valiantly.

The session highlights include:

  • Arion's clever use of a magical illusion to distract the goblins.
  • Evelyn's heroic charge, which saved a merchant's cart.

It was a great start to our new adventure!
